mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(B.STANDARD_ID)) FROM PD_TNC_STD B LEFT JOIN PD_STANDARD A ON A.STANDARD_ID = B.STANDARD_ID

SELECT A.TNC_STD_ITEM_ID AS tncStdItemId ,C.TNC_STD_ITEM_NAME AS tncStdItemName ,A.TNC_STD_VAL1 AS goodVal ,A.TNC_STD_VAL2 AS normalVal ,A.TNC_STD_VAL3 AS badVal FROM PD_TNC_STD AS A LEFT JOIN PD_TNC_STD_ITEM C ON A.TNC_STD_ITEM_ID = C.TNC_STD_ITEM_ID WHERE A.STANDARD_ID = #{filterMap.standardId} ORDER BY A.TNC_STD_ITEM_ID
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(B.STANDARD_ID)) FROM PD_TNC_STD B LEFT JOIN PD_STANDARD A ON A.STANDARD_ID = B.STANDARD_ID

SELECT DISTINCT(B.STANDARD_ID) AS standardId ,A.CLASSES_CODE AS classesCode ,A.BREED_CODE AS breedCode ,A.MACHINING_CODE AS machiningCode ,A.FEATURE_CODE AS featureCode FROM PD_TNC_STD B LEFT JOIN PD_STANDARD A ON A.STANDARD_ID = B.STANDARD_ID ORDER BY B.STANDARD_ID
LIMIT #{startPos}, #{pageCount}
